verses.verse: Moreover the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Now <S%H1121><s%>, you son of man <S%H120><s%>, will you judge <S%H8199><s%>, will you judge <S%H8199><s%> the bloody <S%H1818><s%> city <S%H5892><s%>? Yes <S%H3045><s%>, you shall show her all her abominations <S%H8441><s%>.

Then say <S%H559><s%>, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>, The city <S%H5892><s%> sheds <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of it <S%H6256><s%>, that her time may come <S%H935><s%>, and makes <S%H6213><s%> idols <S%H1544><s%> against herself to defile herself <S%H2930><s%>.

You are become guilty <S%H816><s%> in your blood <S%H1818><s%> that you have shed <S%H8210><s%>; and have defiled <S%H2930><s%> yourself in your idols <S%H1544><s%> which you have made <S%H6213><s%>; and you have caused your days <S%H3117><s%> to draw near <S%H7126><s%>, and are come <S%H935><s%> even unto your years <S%H8141><s%>: therefore have I made <S%H5414><s%> you a reproach <S%H2781><s%> unto the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and a mocking <S%H7048><s%> to all countries <S%H776><s%>.
Those that be near <S%H7138><s%>, and those that be far <S%H7350><s%> from you <S%H7046><s%>, shall mock you <S%H2931><s%>, which are infamous and much <S%H7227><s%> troubled <S%H4103><s%>.
Behold <S%H5387><s%>, the princes of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, every one <S%H376><s%> were in you to their power <S%H2220><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>.

In you have they set light <S%H7043><s%> by father <S%H1><s%> and mother <S%H517><s%>: in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you have they dealt <S%H6213><s%> by oppression <S%H6233><s%> with the stranger <S%H1616><s%>: in you have they troubled <S%H3238><s%> the fatherless <S%H3490><s%> and the widow <S%H490><s%>.
You have despised <S%H959><s%> my holy things <S%H6944><s%>, and have profaned <S%H2490><s%> my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>.

In you are men <S%H582><s%> that carry tales <S%H7400><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>: and in you they eat <S%H398><s%> upon the mountains <S%H2022><s%>: in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of you they commit <S%H6213><s%> lewdness <S%H2154><s%>.
In you have they discovered <S%H1540><s%> their fathers <S%H1><s%>' nakedness <S%H6172><s%>: in you have they humbled <S%H6031><s%> her that was set apart <S%H5079><s%> for pollution <S%H2931><s%>.

And one <S%H376><s%> has committed <S%H6213><s%> abomination <S%H8441><s%> with his neighbors <S%H7453><s%> wife <S%H802><s%>; and another <S%H376><s%> has lewdly <S%H2154><s%> defiled <S%H2930><s%> his daughter in law <S%H3618><s%>; and another <S%H376><s%> in you has humbled <S%H6031><s%> his sister <S%H269><s%>, his father <S%H1><s%>'s daughter <S%H1323><s%>.

In you have they taken <S%H3947><s%> gifts <S%H7810><s%> to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>; you have taken <S%H3947><s%> usury <S%H5392><s%> and increase <S%H8636><s%>, and you have greedily gained <S%H1214><s%> of your neighbors <S%H7453><s%> by extortion <S%H6233><s%>, and have forgotten <S%H7911><s%> me <S%H5002><s%>, says the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>.

Behold <S%H5221><s%>, therefore I have struck my hand <S%H3709><s%> at your dishonest gain <S%H1215><s%> which you have made <S%H6213><s%>, and at your blood <S%H1818><s%> which has been in the midst of you <S%H8432><s%>.

Can your heart <S%H3820><s%> endure <S%H5975><s%>, or can your hands <S%H3027><s%> be strong <S%H2388><s%>, in the days <S%H3117><s%> that I shall deal <S%H6213><s%> with you <S%H3068><s%>? I the Lord have spoken <S%H1696><s%> it <S%H6213><s%>, and will do it.

And I will scatter <S%H6327><s%> you among the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and disperse <S%H2219><s%> you in the countries <S%H776><s%>, and will consume <S%H8552><s%> your filthiness out of you <S%H2932><s%>.
And you shall take your inheritance <S%H2490><s%> in yourself in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the heathen <S%H1471><s%>, and you shall know <S%H3045><s%> that I am the Lord <S%H3068><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> is to me become dross <S%H5509><s%>: all they are brass <S%H5178><s%>, and tin <S%H913><s%>, and iron <S%H1270><s%>, and lead <S%H5777><s%>, in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the furnace <S%H3564><s%>; they are even the dross <S%H5509><s%> of silver <S%H3701><s%>.

Therefore thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>; Because you are all become dross <S%H5509><s%>, behold <S%H6908><s%>, therefore I will gather you into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%>.

As they gather <S%H6910><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%>, and brass <S%H5178><s%>, and iron <S%H1270><s%>, and lead <S%H5777><s%>, and tin <S%H913><s%>, into the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the furnace <S%H3564><s%>, to blow <S%H5301><s%> the fire <S%H784><s%> upon it <S%H5413><s%>, to melt it <S%H6908><s%>; so will I gather you in my anger <S%H639><s%> and in my fury <S%H2534><s%>, and I will leave <S%H3240><s%> you there <S%H5413><s%>, and melt you.
Yes <S%H3664><s%>, I will gather you <S%H5301><s%>, and blow upon you in the fire <S%H784><s%> of my wrath <S%H5678><s%>, and you shall be melted <S%H5413><s%> in the midst there <S%H8432><s%>.

As silver <S%H3701><s%> is melted <S%H2046><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> of the furnace <S%H3564><s%>, so shall you be melted <S%H5413><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> there <S%H3045><s%>; and you shall know that I the Lord <S%H3068><s%> have poured out <S%H8210><s%> my fury upon you <S%H2534><s%>.
And the word <S%H1697><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came unto me <S%H559><s%>, saying,

Son <S%H1121><s%> of man <S%H120><s%>, say <S%H559><s%> unto her <S%H776><s%>, You are the land that is not cleansed <S%H2891><s%>, nor rained <S%H1656><s%> upon in the day <S%H3117><s%> of indignation <S%H2195><s%>.

There is a conspiracy <S%H7195><s%> of her prophets <S%H5030><s%> in the midst <S%H8432><s%> there <S%H7580><s%>, like a roaring lion <S%H738><s%> ravening <S%H2963><s%> the prey <S%H2964><s%>; they have devoured <S%H398><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%>; they have taken <S%H3947><s%> the treasure <S%H2633><s%> and precious things <S%H3366><s%>; they have made her many <S%H7235><s%> widows <S%H490><s%> in the midst there <S%H8432><s%>.

Her priests <S%H3548><s%> have violated <S%H2554><s%> my law <S%H8451><s%>, and have profaned <S%H2490><s%> my holy things <S%H6944><s%>: they have put no difference <S%H914><s%> between the holy <S%H6944><s%> and profane <S%H2455><s%>, neither have they showed <S%H3045><s%> difference between the unclean <S%H2931><s%> and the clean <S%H2889><s%>, and have hid <S%H5956><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> from my sabbaths <S%H7676><s%>, and I am profaned <S%H2490><s%> among them <S%H8432><s%>.

Her princes <S%H8269><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> there are like wolves <S%H2061><s%> ravening <S%H2963><s%> the prey <S%H2964><s%>, to shed <S%H8210><s%> blood <S%H1818><s%>, and to destroy <S%H6><s%> souls <S%H5315><s%>, to get <S%H1214><s%> dishonest gain <S%H1215><s%>.

And her prophets <S%H5030><s%> have coated <S%H2902><s%> them with untempered <S%H8602><s%> mortar <S%H2374><s%>, seeing vanity <S%H7723><s%>, and divining <S%H7080><s%> lies <S%H3577><s%> unto them <S%H559><s%>, saying, Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>, when the Lord <S%H3068><s%> has not spoken <S%H1696><s%>.

The people <S%H5971><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> have used oppression <S%H6231><s%>, and exercised <S%H1497><s%> robbery <S%H1498><s%>, and have troubled <S%H3238><s%> the poor <S%H6041><s%> and needy <S%H34><s%>: Yes <S%H6231><s%>, they have oppressed the stranger <S%H1616><s%> wrongfully <S%H4941><s%>.

And I sought <S%H1245><s%> for a man <S%H376><s%> among them <S%H1443><s%>, that should make up the hedge <S%H1447><s%>, and stand <S%H5975><s%> in the gap <S%H6556><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me for the land <S%H776><s%>, that I should not destroy <S%H7843><s%> it <S%H4672><s%>: but I found none.

Therefore have I poured out <S%H8210><s%> my indignation <S%H2195><s%> upon them <S%H3615><s%>; I have consumed them with the fire <S%H784><s%> of my wrath <S%H5678><s%>: their own way <S%H1870><s%> have I recompensed <S%H5414><s%> upon their heads <S%H7218><s%>, says <S%H5002><s%> the Lord <S%H136><s%> God <S%H3069><s%>.
